Regulation Name(s): Rt-Qpcr Assay For Mrna Transcript Immune Biomarkers
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Immunexpress SeptiCyte RAPID gene expression assay using RT-qPCR on Biocartis Idylla System to aid differentiation of sepsis from non-infectious inflammation.
Indications for Use Summary: Used in conjunction with clinical assessment to aid in differentiating infection-positive (sepsis) from infection-negative systemic inflammation in patients suspected of sepsis on first day of ICU admission, via gene expression analysis from whole blood collected in PAXgene Blood RNA tube.
